name: DataCite
goal: DataCite makes research better by enabling people to find, share, use and cite data. We are a leading global membership organization offering reliable persistent data identification. We engage stakeholders including researchers, scholars, data centers, libraries, publishers, and funders through advocacy, guidance, and services.
interests: Digital economy and society, Research and innovation
euInitiatives: DataCite follows EU initiatives particularly related to data, open data, research infrastructure, research policy, and issues related to these areas.
